description: South Korea's central bank warned on Thursday that greater attention should be paid to the impact of a weaker won on inflation and reaffirmed that its interest rate policies were focused on fighting inflation.
title: Bank of Korea says it will monitor impact of weaker won on inflation - Reuters.com
content: SEOUL, June 9 (Reuters) - South Korea's central bank warned on Thursday that greater attention should be paid to the impact of a weaker won on inflation and reaffirmed that its interest rate policies… [+720 chars]

description: Major Gulf equities fell in early trade on Tuesday, mirroring a fall in its Asian peers amid inflation fears, ahead of U.S. inflation data and central bank meetings in Europe and the United States.
title: Financials lead major Gulf bourses lower amid inflation worries - Reuters.com
content: June 7 (Reuters) - Major Gulf equities fell in early trade on Tuesday, mirroring a fall in its Asian peers amid inflation fears, ahead of U.S. inflation data and central bank meetings in Europe and t… [+1573 chars]

description: Record high euro zone inflation risked fuelling "inflation psychology," European Central Bank chief economist Philip Lane said on Monday, referring to a phenomenon when consumers and businesses adjust their habits in anticipation of higher prices.
title: Euro zone at risk of "inflation psychology", ECB's Lane says - Reuters
content: LONDON, June 20 (Reuters) - Record high euro zone inflation risked fuelling "inflation psychology," European Central Bank chief economist Philip Lane said on Monday, referring to a phenomenon when co… [+692 chars]

description: Indian shares fell 2.5% on Monday and the rupee hit a record low, as U.S. inflation data and a COVID-19 warning from Beijing roiled global markets, with traders in Asia's third-largest economy waiting for May consumer price data for further cues.
title: Inflation fears hammer Indian shares - Reuters.com
content: BENGALURU, June 13 (Reuters) - Indian shares fell 2.5% on Monday and the rupee hit a record low, as U.S. inflation data and a COVID-19 warning from Beijing roiled global markets, with traders in Asia… [+1960 chars]

description: The Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL) raised its key rates by a full percentage point on Thursday to tackle record high domestic inflation and to contain any build-up of adverse inflation expectations.
title: Sri Lanka cenbank raises rates to contain record high inflation - Reuters.com
